ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.1_0: who had sex with a legal issue of the four kinds of legal issues.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:1.2_0: he had sexual intercourse with the four legal issues. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, that is an offense.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits of legal issues in water, there is an offense for the four offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.6:3.1_0: The sixth section for recitation on legal issues is finished.
